entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -18.8°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight and ending overnight then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
